gobblin.config.store.hdfs

Class SimpleHadoopFilesystemConfigStoreFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.config.store.hdfs.SimpleHadoopFilesystemConfigStoreFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigStoreFactory<SimpleHadoopFilesystemConfigStore>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SimpleHDFSConfigStoreFactory, SimpleLocalHDFSConfigStoreFactory

    public abstract class SimpleHadoopFilesystemConfigStoreFactory
extends Object
implements ConfigStoreFactory<SimpleHadoopFilesystemConfigStore>
    An abstract base class for ConfigStoreFactorys based on FileSystem. Subclasses should implement getPhysicalScheme(), getDefaultStoreFs(Config, Optional) and getDefaultRootDir(Config, FileSystem, Optional).

      • SimpleHadoopFilesystemConfigStoreFactory

        public SimpleHadoopFilesystemConfigStoreFactory(Config factoryConfig)
        Instantiates a new instance of the factory with the specified config. The configuration is expected to be scoped, i.e. the properties should not be prefixed.

    • Method Detail

      • getPhysicalScheme

        protected abstract String getPhysicalScheme()
        Returns the physical scheme this ConfigStoreFactory is responsible for. To support new HDFS FileSystem implementations, subclasses should override this method.

      • getDefaultStoreFs

        protected abstract FileSystem getDefaultStoreFs(Config factoryConfig,
                                                Optional<URI> configDefinedDefaultURI)
        Returns the default FileSystem used for ConfigStores generated by this factory.
        Parameters:
        factoryConfig - the user supplied factory configuration.
        configDefinedDefaultURI - if the user specified a default uri, that uri.

      • getDefaultRootDir

        protected abstract URI getDefaultRootDir(Config factoryConfig,
                                         FileSystem defaultFileSystem,
                                         Optional<URI> configDefinedDefaultURI)
        Returns the URI for the default store created by this factory.
        Parameters:
        factoryConfig - the user supplied factory configuration.
        configDefinedDefaultURI - if the user specified a default uri, that uri.
        defaultFileSystem - the default FileSystem obtained from getDefaultStoreFs(Config, Optional).

      • getScheme

        public String getScheme()
        Specified by:
        getScheme in interface ConfigStoreFactory<SimpleHadoopFilesystemConfigStore>
        Returns:
        the URI scheme for which this configuration store factory is responsible. All the configuration store created by this configuration factory will share the same scheme name.

      • createConfigStore

        public SimpleHadoopFilesystemConfigStore createConfigStore(URI configKey)
                                                    throws ConfigStoreCreationException
        Creates a SimpleHadoopFilesystemConfigStore for the given URI. The URI specified should be the fully qualified path to the dataset in question. For example, simple-hdfs://[authority]:[port][path-to-config-store][path-to-dataset]. It is important to note that the path to the config store on HDFS must also be specified. The combination [path-to-config-store][path-to-dataset] need not specify an actual Path on HDFS.

        If the URI does not contain an authority, a default authority and root directory are provided. The default authority is taken from the NameNode URI the current process is co-located with. The default path is "/user/[current-user]/".

        Specified by:
        createConfigStore in interface ConfigStoreFactory<SimpleHadoopFilesystemConfigStore>
        Parameters:
        configKey - The URI of the config key that needs to be accessed.
        Returns:
        a SimpleHadoopFilesystemConfigStore configured with the the given URI.
        Throws:
        ConfigStoreCreationException - if the SimpleHadoopFilesystemConfigStore could not be created.

      • getSchemePrefix

        protected String getSchemePrefix()

      • isAuthorityRequired

        protected boolean isAuthorityRequired()
